--- title: Transforms keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Basic function to process time-series data before assembling it in a `DataLoaders`." --- 
from nbdev.showdoc import *

tmf = ToTensor()
test_eq(tmf(np.array([1])), tensor([1]).float())
test_eq(tmf((np.array(1),np.array(1))),(tensor(1),tensor(1)))
test_eq(tmf.decode((tensor(1),tensor(1))),(np.array(1),np.array(1)))
